dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 773 IH: To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to repeal certain provisions relating to the acceptance and use of contributions for public-private partnerships, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Hageman introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to repeal certain provisions relating to the acceptance and use of contributions for public-private partnerships, and for other purposes.

section.text: Section 1241(f) of the Food Security Act of 1985 (16 U.S.C. 3841(f)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in the subsection heading, by striking for public-Private partnerships;
by amending paragraph (1) to read as follows:

Subject to paragraph (2), the Secretary may establish a sub-account for each conservation program administered by the Secretary under subtitle D to accept contributions of non-Federal funds to support the purposes of the program.

in paragraph (2), by striking a covered program shall be deposited into the account and inserting a conservation program administered by the Secretary under subtitle D shall be deposited into the sub-account; and
